title: CAF Champions League : We know how to beat Remo Stars - Medeama boss , Adotey
body_text:
Sport
CAF Champions League: We know how to beat Remo Stars – Medeama boss, Adotey
Medeama SC head coach, Evans Adotey has claimed he will work out a strategy to beat Remo Stars in their CAF Champions League preliminary round fixture.
The Ghanaian champions will host Remo Stars in the first leg encounter at the Cape Coast Stadium on Sunday.
The game will kick-off at 4pm Nigerian time.
Remo Stars finished second in the Nigeria Professional Football League last season and will be making their maiden appearance in the CAF Champions League.
Last season, the Sky Blue Stars also featured in the CAF Confederation Cup for the first time.
Adotey reckoned that he has followed Remo Stars closely and knows how to beat the Ikenne club.
“One may not come out as a coach to demonstrate or brief the public as to how he plans or his knowledge about the opponent; we have observed their games.
“Recently, I saw their games during a tournament in Nigeria. I have seen them severally and I have tapes of their games.
“We’ve identified a few points, including weaknesses and strengths. We’ve seen them and we’ve planned for them,” he told a press conference.
